name: @yuanzhibang/extension-debugger
description: 猿之棒拓展调试工具，主要用于网络模拟renderer进程通信,以及单元测试

scripts.prepublish-npm: rm -rf dist ; npm run prod ; cp package.json dist/package.json ; mkdir -p dist/view ; cp src/debug.html dist/view/debug.html
scripts.publish-npm: cd dist ; npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.com
scripts.release: npm version patch; npm run publish-npm
